snippet: Meet Pooja, the 11-year-old girl campaigning for better education.
abstract: Meet Pooja, the 11-year-old girl campaigning for better education.
lead_paragraph: Pooja Gujjar is the consummate politician. She's quick-witted and outspoken, and, as her every-ready, dimpled smile suggests, always up for a challenge. She has, admittedly, a girlish streak. The first time she stood for election she chose as her symbol a flower. And although she lost, to a boy, she's proud that all the girls voted for her.

headline.main: Child Politicians Bring Change to Rural India
